attributes.action: Prevent social landlords from making Mutual Exchange charges (Safety Checks)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Some social landlordssuch are making it common practice to charge their tenants for safety checks when applying to exchange their homes.

The landlords argue that the Housing Act does not prevent them from doing this! (Despite it being their responsibility) Quite simply this in not enforceable - an exchange cannot be lawfully refused on the grounds of refusal to make this payment, and therefore it should be clear that the charge is voluntary.

Excessive charges are resulting in many tenants being unable to exercise thier right to exchange, and continuing to occupy unsuitable housing.

government_responses.details:
